title: Gormicsta
author: Gormicsta
content: Normally life of a newbie for this forum no easy at all, we go get plenty questions and plenty challenges here, and no be all the questions self na e them fit answer finish. Except for those newbies wey get mentor ls wey dey coach them concerning how far for the forum. But for those wey no get anybody, e no easy. And I don also figure out say our major challenge for this forum na how to make our face show and how to make Merits. Anytime we talk about this merit matter, our Top men for the house go tell us say make we calm down, construct better quality posts and Merits go come ( like say na so e easy reach) some of us no even know how them dey even take dey construct that quality post so e don become double wahala.So I just dey Waka around the forum I come see some posts where them dey explain how Newbies fit construct better ogbonge posts, so I come tif small idea come add my own too say make I share make we the newbies fit hold hand there, work on am then hope say e go work for us.So to make better Post, the first thing we need to do nah to...COME UP WITH BETTER SUBJECT For anyone wey don write project proposal before, dem go sabi say e dey very important make you do research. You go need spend time do research and discuss with experts for the subject wey you wan write about. You go find out if person don write about the topic before and if solution dey. You go also check if there still more things to talk about for the topic. All these go help you decide how to continue and avoid dey repeat wetin others don already talk.CREATE POST WEY GO ENTER EYE.To create post  wey go enter eye na to make your idea or topic fine and attractive. Just like how perfume wey smell nice fit make something more appealing. To get people wey go dey interested for your topic, you need make you get one good presentation. Example, if you get choice between to watch movie for black and white TV or colorful HD TV, you go probably choose the colorful one. The same thing na im dey apply to topics - dem need make dem dey easy to understand and look good so that people go like am.BETTER CONTENTContent wey good suppose get introduction, middle part, and conclusion. E go help to show your message and make people understand your topic. E dey important to make sure say people dey interested to continue read your content and dem no go feel say dem waste their time. Make your content dey thoughtful and clear.TIPS WEY FIT HELP YOU TO CREATE BETTER POST1. Abeg no rush publish topic, Find time make you study your subject.2. Make you give us the text wey you want make we write again with simple words.3. You fit use dictionary find any words wey you no spell well.4. Involve your audience for discussion if e dey necessary.5. Make you use correct punctuation so you no go make mistake wen you dey type.6. Make you use good words and vocabulary.7. If e dey necessary, include the correct links and references.8. Share advice and ideas when e dey necessary.9. Make you dey honest and straightforward for the way you present your topic.10. Make sure say your topic short, easy to understand, and carry the nail hit for the head.I believe say if we follow this method we fit come up with better posts wey fit earn us Merits. Abeg if anybody get any other tips to add make e add make we for fit learn too. Una well done.

If e dey necessary, include the correct links and references.Especially if you copy some sentences and not originally from you, it is good to include the link because if the link is not included, it would be regarded as plagiarism and this can lead to ban. Some newbies do not like to reference, thinking not referencing it will earn them merit, but instead their account would be banned. There are a lot of posts that are referenced and yet given merits.

Aside that I go also like yo add some few point join the ones wey you don put for ground1 to become a better poster e go good make the writer think critically first on which board go value that post first before em post am for any where. For this forum I don see many post wey If to say e dey the right place e for collect enough merit, sometimes post wey supposed to dey for bitcoin discussion, you go see am for beginner and help board, no be say some of this post them no dey get merit oo, but the main place where e  for take get enough merit no be the poster go Post am.2 some newbies for this forum dey develop some fictional story wey no dey exist and dem go come publish am like say na real story, in other words make we no dey lie lie anyhow for this forum, because eyes dey wet dey watch you, some person fit spend the whole day dey watch newbie account and if dem find any fault e no dey hard dem to report make dem for give you tag or ban.3 wattin Boss Charles-Tim talk no be lie oo, say some post with reference still dey get beta merit I no ague that one, but most merit source no dey like make your post no dey original, if you observe sef you go see say for some of their merit give away thread dem, dem dey always say make you no add link to post wey na news. Dem nor dey too like am so e for good make your post always dey original, and If you wan get this kind of quality just do enough study and reading then ideas of good posts go just enter your head.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 05:30:22 AMQuote from: Gormicsta on November 20, 2023, 11:40:30 PM7. If e dey necessary, include the correct links and references.Especially if you copy some sentences and not originally from you, it is good to include the link because if the link is not included, it would be regarded as plagiarism and this can lead to ban. I have seen instances of quoting a sentence or paragraph from an article or post of another person without adding the link to the entire article. There are some that also use quotation mark to indicate that certain phrases are not theirs but taken from somewhere. I think these are valid ways of avoiding being associated with plagiarism because you have indicated they were taken from somewhere and not your original idea. I don't know if you think otherwise regarding this. Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 05:30:22 AMSome newbies do not like to reference, thinking not referencing it will earn them merit, but instead their account would be banned. There are a lot of posts that are referenced and yet given merits.This is true and a major problem for them. They struggle so hard to impress their audience and sometimes forgetting that giving credit to owners of the original ideas is the best way to impresses the audience. In academic writing,  a chapter is usually dedicated to references which is a repository of the materials and sources used in the particular study. This shows they understand the importance of giving credits to whom it is due.
